author: Jessica Campisi, CNN
title: Deaf Americans are urging the White House to use sign language interpreters at coronavirus briefings
description: The US Census Bureau estimates that about 11.5 million Americans have some degree of hearing loss. Yet months into the coronavirus pandemic, the White House still does not have American Sign Language interpreters at its televised public health press briefings.
